title: Your Wallet: Money and vice
contentencoded:
This week, we hear how things that could be considered vices have affected your financial life. 

Lizzie O'Leary spoke to NerdWallet's General Manager of Health Christina LaMontagne about where your vices intersect with your wallet.

Send us an email, or reach us on Twitter, @MarketplaceWKND

Listen to the full story in the audio player above.

teaser: Cigarettes, video games, pot...whatever your predilection, we want to know.
